brand_identity.name: CanvasFlow
principles: Content is King: The canvas is the hero. UI gets out of the way.
Radical Clarity: Tools are there when you need them, invisible when you don't.
Playful Precision: Engineering-grade alignment with hand-drawn approachability.
Motion as Feedback: Every action (draw, undo, connect) has a micro-interaction.

headings.usage: Landing page headlines, Modal titles, Feature callouts

code.usage: Coordinates, Technical data, AI prompt inputs

landing_page.hero: Split screen: Left side typography (H1), Right side interactive mini-canvas or video loop.
landing_page.features: Bento Grid (Mode A: Tetris). Mix of 2x2 squares and 1x2 tall rectangles.
landing_page.spacing: Generous. Section padding py-24 or py-32.

app_interface.toolbar: Floating pill-shaped container at bottom-center (z-50). Glassmorphism.
app_interface.header: Minimalist top bar (z-40). Logo left, User avatars/Share right. Transparent with blur on scroll.
app_interface.panels: Collapsible sidebars (z-40). Floating, detached from edges (m-4 rounded-xl).

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-6 rounded-full shadow-lg transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-black/5 hover:bg-white text-foreground h-10 px-6 rounded-full shadow-sm transition-all hover:shadow-md
buttons.icon: h-10 w-10 rounded-full bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-black/5 hover:bg-white hover:scale-110 transition-all

cards.style: bg-white/60 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 shadow-xl rounded-2xl

inputs.style: bg-white/50 backdrop-blur-sm border-black/5 focus:border-black/20 focus:ring-0 rounded-lg h-10

visual_enhancers.gradients: Subtle mesh gradients for 'AI Magic' moments (e.g., when AI is generating).
visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, diffuse shadows. Avoid harsh black shadows.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.06) for structure. 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.4) for highlights.

assets.icons: Lucide React (default). Use stroke-width={1.5} for a refined look.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-performance collaborative tool. Prioritize canvas responsiveness.
instructions_to_main_agent.konva_implementation: Use 'react-konva'. Ensure the Stage is responsive. Implement 'infinite canvas' logic (panning/zooming).
instructions_to_main_agent.ai_panel: The AI panel should feel like a 'copilot'. Use a magical/gradient border when it has suggestions.
instructions_to_main_agent.collaboration: Cursors must be smooth. Use 'perfect-cursors' or simple interpolation for movement.
instructions_to_main_agent.theme_toggle: Implement a Dark Mode toggle. In Dark Mode, invert the canvas to a 'Blueprint' style (Dark Blue/Black bg, White/Cyan lines).

universal_guidelines.spacing: Use generous padding (p-6, p-8) inside containers.
universal_guidelines.feedback: All interactive elements must have hover and active states.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios. Use aria-labels for canvas tools.
